headline: Ask HN: Are Facebook and Google engineers slacking around with little work?
description:
I read this article: https://wap.business-standard.com/article/international/too-many-employees-but-few-work-pichai-zuckerberg-sound-the-alarm-122080801425_1.html

"Zuckerberg noticed that it was getting harder to get all the employees to attend a meeting as they were sometimes taking time out in a day for personal work."

It seems like many smart engineers are hired but not given any real work to perform?! Leetcode can't test for drive and passion?!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 脸书和谷歌的工程师们是否在偷懒，工作很少？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 臉書和谷歌的工程師們是否在偷懶，工作很少？
description_zh-Hans:
我读了这篇文章。 https://wap.business-standard.com/article/international/too-many-employees-but-few-work-pichai-zuckerberg-sound-the-alarm-122080801425_1.html

"扎克伯格注意到，让所有员工参加会议越来越难，因为他们有时会在一天中抽出时间来做个人工作。"

似乎很多聪明的工程师被雇用了，但却没有得到任何实际工作的执行？Leetcode不能测试动力和激情？
description_zh-Hant:
我讀了這篇文章。 https://wap.business-standard.com/article/international/too-many-employees-but-few-work-pichai-zuckerberg-sound-the-alarm-122080801425_1.html

"扎克伯格注意到，讓所有員工參加會議越來越難，因為他們有時會在一天中抽出時間來做個人工作。"

似乎很多聰明的工程師被僱用了，但卻沒有得到任何實際工作的執行？Leetcode不能測試動力和激情？
